title: Why New Energy Assets Underperformed: Breaking the Investment Deadlock (Part 1)
title_zh: 新能源资产表现何以惨淡：新能源投资破局（一）
summary_en: Explains why new-energy assets lagged and outlines the policy targets from the global stocktake (renewables to triple, efficiency to double by 2030) and their market implications.
summary_zh: 解析新能源资产“跌势”成因，梳理全球盘点中提出的2030年可再生能源容量翻倍、能效提升等目标，并讨论对资本与产业的影响。
best_quote_en: By 2030, global renewable capacity must roughly triple while energy efficiency doubles.
best_quote_zh: 到2030年，可再生能源容量需要增加两倍、能源效率要实现倍增。

title: Beating ‘Involution’ with AI: Where China’s New Storage Is Headed
title_zh: 破“内卷”，用AI！高质量发展方案出炉，新型储能未来怎么走？
summary_en: Tracks China’s new storage buildout: 31.39 GW online by end-2023, 2025 provincial output goals topping RMB 3 trillion; discusses AI-driven efficiency and safety.
summary_zh: 梳理我国新型储能装机与地方到2025年产值目标（总目标超3万亿元），并探讨AI在效率与安全上的作用与前景。
best_quote_en: China reached 31.39 GW of new-type storage by end-2023, two years ahead of the 2025 goal.
best_quote_zh: 截至2023年底，我国新型储能累计装机31.39吉瓦，提前两年完成“30吉瓦以上”的目标。

title: The Big-Storage Supercycle: Price Spreads and Market Design
title_zh: 全球万亿能源大变局下，大储趋势分析与预测
summary_en: Shows how rising renewable penetration widens electricity spot-market spreads; cites recent pilot provinces and policy moves expanding spreads to encourage storage.
summary_zh: 以德国等经验与国内试点为例，论证新能源渗透率提升会拉大现货价差；政策层面正通过放开限价等方式为储能创造价差空间。
best_quote_en: As renewables scale, spreads widen—creating the economic room storage needs.
best_quote_zh: 随新能源渗透率上行，现货价差持续扩大，储能的经济空间正在形成。

title: LFP at an Inflection: Wanshun New Energy Ties with Leaders
title_zh: 万润新能：深度绑定行业巨头，行业盈利拐点可期
summary_en: Analyzes LFP supply-demand cleanup, Wanshun’s volume and client structure (BYD/CATL), and why sector profitability may be turning in 2024–2025.
summary_zh: 从产能出清、客户结构与出货增速切入，研判磷酸铁锂材料企业的业绩修复逻辑与2024–2025年的盈利拐点。
best_quote_en: Tighter supply and steadier demand set the stage for an LFP margin turn.
best_quote_zh: 供给出清与需求稳步回升叠加，为铁锂材料盈利拐点铺路。

title: Emergency Care for Photovoltaics
summary_en: Deep dive on PV overcapacity and the proposed joint-platform approach to absorb excess capacity; notes polysilicon futures jumping ~80% in a month.
summary_zh: 系统剖析光伏“产能过剩”的成因与“联合平台承债收购”方案的可行性，并记录多晶硅期货在短期内大幅拉涨的市场信号。
best_quote_en: When survival trumps expansion, consolidation becomes an industry’s oxygen.
best_quote_zh: 当生存压过扩张，“抱团纾困”的整合机制就成了行业的氧气。

title: How Far to the Next PV Cycle?
title_zh: 光伏距离新周期还有多远
summary_en: Argues near-term rebounds are sentiment-driven; sustainable upcycle likely awaits genuine tech shifts amid lingering overcapacity.
summary_zh: 指出短期反弹更多源于情绪与预期修正，真正的行业拐点取决于技术路径演进与过剩产能出清。
best_quote_en: Without tech shifts, rebounds risk being mere relief rallies.
best_quote_zh: 若缺乏技术变革，反弹可能只是“情绪修复”，难改行业底色。

title: Will 2025 Be the Mass-Production Year for Humanoid Robots?
title_zh: 2025年会是人形机器人的量产元年吗？
summary_en: Tracks supply-chain readiness—planetary roller screws, lines ramping—and what it takes to move from pilots to real-world production in 2025.
summary_zh: 以行星滚柱丝杠等核心部件量产线为切口，评估2025年迈向规模化量产的关键约束与产业成熟度。
best_quote_en: From labs to lines: production readiness is the real moat.
best_quote_zh: 从实验室到产线，“量产能力”才是决定性护城河。

title: China Private Funds: Five Strategy Results in 2024
title_zh: 私募五大策略2024年业绩出炉
summary_en: Breakdown of 2024 performance by strategy—value vs growth timing, CTA outperformance—and how portfolios rotated across tech, commodities, and power equipment.
summary_zh: 复盘2024年私募多策略表现与仓位风格切换，梳理从成长/价值到科技、有色、电力设备等板块的阶段性机会。
best_quote_en: Diversified playbooks beat one-style bets in choppy cycles.
best_quote_zh: 在震荡周期里，单一风格难敌“多元配置+动态切换”。

title: NVIDIA’s Playbook for Embodied AI
title_zh: 托举人形机器人崛起！英伟达副总裁详解“秘籍”
summary_en: Details NVIDIA’s Isaac GR00T + Cosmos stack for data generation-to-deployment, positioning foundation models and large-scale sim as the backbone for humanoids.
summary_zh: 系统阐释英伟达从数据生成到部署的全栈方案（Isaac GR00T + Cosmos），并讨论大规模仿真在通用人形机器人上的关键作用。
best_quote_en: From data to deployment, a full-stack is becoming table stakes.
best_quote_zh: 从数据到部署，全栈能力正成为人形机器人的“入场券”。

title: A Thor-Powered Win: Galbot’s Humanoid Victory
title_zh: 银河通用世界人形机器人运动会夺冠，全自主操作遥遥领先
summary_en: Reports on competition results and the tech stack: Jetson Thor platform, multi-robot sim, and a dataset pipeline where 99% of training data is synthetic.
summary_zh: 聚焦夺冠背后的多模态栈与数据路径：Jetson Thor、虚实融合训练，以及“99%合成数据”的高效数据工程体系。
best_quote_en: When 99% of data is synthetic, iteration speed becomes your edge.
best_quote_zh: 当99%的训练数据可合成，研发迭代速度就是核心优势。

title: ICML 2025: New Paradigms for Deep Thinking in LLMs
title_zh: ICML 2025 | 大模型深度思考新范式
summary_en: Covers long chain-of-thought, scratchpads, and reflection-based training for reasoning; discusses limits of ‘write-only’ traces and ways to prune or verify.
summary_zh: 综述长思维链、外部草稿本与反思训练范式，指出“只写不擦”的局限，并讨论裁剪与校验以提升推理稳定性。
best_quote_en: Reasoning isn’t just longer chains—it’s verifiable chains.
best_quote_zh: 深度思考不等于更长的链，而是可校验的思考链。

title: Fast and Slow: Learning & Decisions in the AI Era
title_zh: 快与慢的思考艺术：AI时代下的学习与决策
summary_en: Practical frameworks to toggle between quick intuition and slow analysis; concrete tactics for note-making, attention control, and bias checks.
summary_zh: 给出在“快直觉/慢分析”之间切换的操作框架，并配套笔记、注意力与偏差校准的实操方法。
best_quote_en: Decide fast, think slow—or think slow so you can decide fast.
best_quote_zh: 先快后慢，或先慢后快，关键是会切换“档位”。

title: Three Pitfalls Blocking Deep Thinking
title_zh: 怎样提高你的深度思考力？从这3点做起
summary_en: Explains three common traps—reverse inference, reasoning gaps, slippery slope—and how to counter them with writing, teaching, and context-switching.
summary_zh: 解析逆推谬误、论证断层、滑坡谬误三大陷阱，并用“写下来、教别人、多切换”等方法建立稳健思维流程。
best_quote_en: Write to think; teach to test; switch to refresh.
best_quote_zh: 写是思考，教是检验，“切换”是刷新。

title: Build a Stress-Free English Learning System
title_zh: 搭建个人英语无压学习系统，让英语融入生活
summary_en: A systems approach to sustainable English: inputs, tooling, spaced repetition, and use-in-life to make practice automatic.
summary_zh: 从“系统”入手打造可持续的英语学习：输入路径、工具组合、间隔复习与场景化输出，让练习自动化。
best_quote_zh: 别囤资源，要设计流程与习惯回路。

title: Decoding the New ‘Nine Articles’: Toward High-Quality Markets
title_zh: 新“国九条”重磅发布！券商首席深度解读来了
summary_en: Explains the 2024 guidance’s shift to risk prevention and enforcement, and what it means for equity style, disclosure, and investor protection.
summary_zh: 解读新版“国九条”强化监管、防范风险与投保导向的政策取向，并讨论其对风格、信息披露与投资者结构的影响。
best_quote_zh: 高质量的发展，离不开高质量的监管与法治化市场环境。
